channel.title: Immortal-PvP 317 PI Development Team [OFFICIAL]
channel.description:
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/oj36ee.jpg[/img]
Hello MoparScape, this is my new project called Immortal-PvP. I'm looking to build up a new developing team for my RSPS. Post below if you are interested. We will be in need for a Web Developer, GFX Team. I will host the server.
Server Developers: Open Spot
GFX Team: Open Spot
Client Developers Open Spot
Web Developer: Open Spot
Server Goals: Have a stable and enjoyable server Create a great forums Community Provide People with a place were they can have a good time. Maintain a good player average
Full Screen New Shops All Skills Works Lunar Isle Home No Dupes No Bugs Skillcape Emotes Perfect Combat System 4x Dragon Claws Hits Working Alch Every kill you make you get points to buy things
Pic: [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2drsxm9.jpg[/img]
More Pics Coming Soon
[code] How old are you?
Name?
How long have you been Programming?
What are you applying for?
Why should you be in development team?
Why would you like to be part of the team?
Any other information you wish can be added here[/code]
[b]Interested? PM, Reply or add me on MSN Groen_818@hotmail.com[/b]

item.title: Immortal-PvP 317 PI Development Team [OFFICIAL]

item.description:
@Ljelvin1995 wrote:

Hey Immortal,

How old are you? 16
Name? Lee
How long have you been Programming? Ermm > Html = 3-4years, PHP = 2years, MySQL = 1 year, Java = 2years
What are you applying for? Well, i can do the website for you, i can help with the coding, i can develop the client for you…
Why should you be in development team? Cause Im Mint?
Why would you like to be part of the team? Cause i like be of assistance
Any other information you wish can be added here::

Get Back too me soon buddy
Lee.
